message: I'll give you a generous offer to start, let's settle quickly!
I'll take 60% and let you have the rest. It's a fair start.
You're being greedy, but I'll give you a chance to take this deal before things get worse!
I'll take a bit less, but still a good chunk of the money. Your turn to think about it.
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'll take a bit more, but still leave you with a decent amount. Don't expect any more generosity from me!
I'm running out of patience, take it or leave it!
I'll take most of it, you're running out of options!
This is my last offer, take it or I'll leave with nothing!
I'll take almost all of it, you're getting desperate!
This is my last, last offer. Take it or I'll leave with nothing!
I'll take almost all of it, you're out of options and I'm not getting any more generous.
